Description: Postcard; printed paper; monochrome (black and white) photograph showing Post Office Street, Alexandria.
Curator's comments: Old card; postally used. Message reads: "V - talk about their girlies & say their [sic] engaged- I feel I really ought to be. Still, dear, we have come to an agreement haven't we? I only wish it was time but I have always been very impatient haven't I dear? The P.O. [Post Office] on this card is at the further end on the left hand side. Well, pet, I must finish this now as it is bed time. Don't forget to write long letters with my very best love & heaps of kisses. Yours ever affectionately, Jack xxxxxx". Message continues from EPH-ME 2932.
Associated places: Topographic representation of: Post Office Street
